description: Manage the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules of a storage account's blob service properties.

commands.name: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule add
commands.summary: Add a CORS rule for a storage account.
commands.syntax:
az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule add --account-name
                                                         --allowed-methods
                                                         --allowed-origins
                                                         --max-age
                                                         [--allowed-headers]
                                                         [--exposed-headers]
                                                         [--resource-group]
examples: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule add --account-name mystorageaccount --resource-group myresourcegroup --allowed-origins "http://*.contoso.com" --allowed-methods PUT GET --max-age 200

commands.name: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule clear
commands.summary: Clear all CORS rules for a storage account.
commands.syntax:
az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule clear --account-name
                                                           [--resource-group]
examples: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule clear --account-name mystorageaccount --resource-group myresourcegroup

commands.name: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule list
commands.summary: List all CORS rules of a storage account's blob service properties.
commands.syntax:
az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule list --account-name
                                                          [--resource-group]
examples: az storage account blob-service-properties cors-rule list --account-name mystorageaccount --resource-group myresourcegroup
